entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -11.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
